name: Cancer Care
description: When you’re facing cancer, you want only the best by your side. At Atrium Health Levine Cancer Institute, you’ll find expert care focused on helping you heal – and helping you thrive.With more than 25 cancer care locations, we provide access to top-ranked physician expertise, groundbreaking clinical trials and the latest cancer treatments across the Carolinas.
info: Cancer is treatable.WE will provide therapy and all the other things to get you recover

name: Musculoskeletal
description: When you’re in pain or your range of motion is limited, it can feel as if your whole world has come to a standstill. We’re here to help you get back in action – and feel your best.Atrium Health Musculoskeletal Institute offers specialized care for every musculoskeletal condition affecting your bones, muscles, cartilage, tendons, ligaments, joints and other connective tissue. So, whether you want to get back to peak sports performance or you need hip or knee surgery, we’re ready to provide the very best care to you.
info: Muscle problem , tendon ligament pain in the joint all are treated very well

name: Women`s care
